i1.name: Runic_Blade
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Riven's''' [[champion ability|ability]] casts generate a stack of ''Charge'' that lasts 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent casts and stacks up to 3 times. '''Riven's''' [[basic attack]]s consume a stack to deal {{as|{{pp|key=%|30 to 60 for 6|1;6 to 18|formula=30% + 6% at level 6, then + 6% every 3 levels}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
The '''bonus''' damage is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers and {{tip|applies lifesteal|applies}} {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Riven's champion ability casts generate a stack of Charge that lasts 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent casts and stacks up to 3 times. Riven's basic attacks consume a stack to deal 1;6 to 18 ‒ undefined AD bonus physical damage.
The bonus damage is affected by critical strike modifiers and applies Unknown value: stil / life steal at 100% effectiveness.
i1.notes:
* ''Runic Blade's'' duration also refreshes when '''Riven''' consumes a stack.
* The empowered attack will not trigger against [[structures]] nor [[ward]]s.

q1.name: Broken_Wings
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' can activate ''Broken Wings'' three times before the ability goes on cooldown, with a {{fd|0.3125}}-second {{tt|static cooldown|Unaffected by ability haste}} between casts. If '''Riven''' does not recast the ability within 4 seconds of the previous cast, it goes on cooldown.

'''Riven''' slashes with her sword for each of the three casts, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies struck within an area, {{tip|Basic attack reset|resetting}} her basic attack timer, and ordering her to basic attack the target of ''Broken Wings'' if there are any.

{{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Riven''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} up to 225 units towards the target enemy or in the direction she is currently facing, striking enemies in the target area 100 units away. This cast cannot cross terrain.
{{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Riven''' mimics the first cast's effects.
{{sbc|Third Cast:}} '''Riven''' mimics the first cast's effects in a larger area while also {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} enemies hit 75 units over {{fd|0.5}} seconds. This cast can cross terrain.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Riven can activate Broken Wings three times before the ability goes on cooldown, with a 0.3125-second static cooldown between casts. If Riven does not recast the ability within 4 seconds of the previous cast, it goes on cooldown.
Riven slashes with her sword for each of the three casts, dealing physical damage to enemies struck within an area, resetting her basic attack timer, and ordering her to basic attack the target of Broken Wings if there are any.
First Cast: Riven dashes up to 225 units towards the target enemy or in the direction she is currently facing, striking enemies in the target area 100 units away. This cast cannot cross terrain.
Second Cast: Riven mimics the first cast's effects.
Third Cast: Riven mimics the first cast's effects in a larger area while also knocking back enemies hit 75 units over 0.5 seconds. This cast can cross terrain.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|15 to 95}} {{as|(+ {{ap|45 to 65}}% AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|15*3 to 95*3}} {{as|(+ {{ap|45*3 to 65*3}}% AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* Each cast counts as a single ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The basic attack reset is not considered one for {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.
* After using this ability, '''Riven''' is able to use ''{{ai|Valor|Riven}}'' sooner than basic attacks and other abilities.
* The {{sbc|Third Cast}} prevents '''Riven''' from using basic attacks and abilities for longer than the other 2 casts.

w1.name: Ki_Burst
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' emits a flash of runic energy before the cast time, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Riven emits a flash of runic energy before the cast time, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.
w1.notes: * '''Riven''' is briefly unable to basic attack after the cast time.

e1.name: Valor
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the target location, though not through terrain, while {{tip|shield|shielding}} herself for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

''Other abilities can be cast during the dash, and ''{{ai|Q|Riven}}'' may be cast during ''{{ai|W|Riven}}'' or ''{{ai|R|Riven}}'' cast times if they're used at the end or briefly after the dash.''{{bug|1}}
''Valor will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Riven dashes to the target location, though not through terrain, while shielding herself for 1.5 seconds.
Other abilities can be cast during the dash, and Riven's Q may be cast during Riven's W or Riven's R cast times if they're used at the end or briefly after the dash.Unknown value: bug / 1
Valor will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

r1.name: Blade_of_the_Exile
description:
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' empowers her blade for 15 seconds, gaining {{as|20% AD}} {{sti|ad|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}, {{sti|range|75 '''bonus''' attack range}}, and increased range on ''{{ai|Broken Wings|Riven}}'' and ''{{ai|Ki Burst|Riven}}''.

After {{fd|0.5}} seconds, she can cast ''{{ai|Wind Slash|Riven}}'' within the duration.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Riven empowers her blade for 15 seconds, gaining 20% AD bonus attack damage, 75 bonus attack range, and increased range on Riven's Broken Wings and Riven's Ki Burst.

After 0.5 seconds, she can cast Riven's Wind Slash within the duration.
r1.notes:
* All bonuses are gained after {{fd|0.5}} seconds of the ability starting its cast.
** The {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} amount is factored upon cast, and does not change.
* If '''Riven''' has a basic attack buffered before the end of ''Blade of the Exile's'' cast time, the buffered basic attack will start {{fd|0.33}} seconds after the end of the cast time.
** The delay will not apply to basic attack commands input after ''Blade of the Exile's'' cast time.

r2.name: Wind_Slash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' unleashes a wave of energy in a cone in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit once, increased by {{as|{{pp|type='''missing''' health|key=%|0 to 200 for 9|key1=%|0 to 75|formula=2.667% per 1% missing health. ''This is capped at 200% bonus damage at 75% missing health.''}}|health}}.
r2.descriptionHtml: Active: Riven unleashes a wave of energy in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit once, increased by 0 to 75 ‒ undefined.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|100 to 200}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Physical Damage|{{ap|100*3 to 200*3}} {{as|(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
r2.notes:
* ''Wind Slash'' counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* ''Wind Slash's'' wave is made up of three individual missiles spread in a cone.
** Each enemy can be damaged by only one missile.<!--Marker buff duration?-->
* If ''Wind Slash'' hits an enemy while ''Riven'' is not visible, it will briefly grant {{tip|sight}} of the area around her to enemies.<!--Radius? Perception bubble duration? Same as the 'upon targeting/attacking from Bush or Fog' one?-->
* If '''Riven''' has a basic attack buffered before the end of ''Wind Slash's'' cast time, the buffered basic attack will start {{fd|0.528}} seconds after the end of the cast time.
** The delay is not applied if a basic attack command is input after the cast time.
